attributes.action: Children who are doing their GCSEs and A Levels need HOME ACCESS GRAND more than year 3-9  children..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a single parent receiving benefits at the moment. My daughter is in year 11 and my son is in year 10. They are both doing their GCSE and need internet access very much. Definetly much more than 7-8 years old children. I would like Goverment to make HOME ACCESS GRAND eligible for GCSE and A Level students.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
